title: When you are last pick, and your team tells you that you are ADC
body:
and you are trying to remain positive.
http://www.reactiongifs.com/r/kgymh.gif

replies.body: I am normally support, but the odd time this happens I have the same reaction, lol
Well, when my allies force me to ADC the joke is on them. I am the worst ADC in NA.
That's a lie, I'm the worst ADC in NA.
We need a contest to settle this.
We would both lose.
I would lose harder >:)

So you all admit I'm the worst?
That was easy. ;p
Hell no. I'm so bad that I feed when I'm smurfing.
I feed the lane minions.
I went to play ADC my ping got so high , fed the server...
The server generally just crashes the match out of pain from watching me ADC.
When i pick adc i miss so much last hits the minions live till retirement.
. . . Because our own minion quite after seeing my name in the loading screen.
This should be by far the most epic "Who's the worst ADC NA" Contest ever in the history of League.
. . . For "assisting enemy team".
im so bad at adc i fed while playing vayne

Nah. that doesn't mean anything.
Keep that circle-jerk nonsense out of legitimate debates. ;p
That's because they're the ones smurfing
These people will also be useful in the best babysitter (support) contests.
I also main support.

Same
Gotta love making a monster
It's the ~~laning with~~ Raising I can live without often times. XD

I'm so bad I had riot delete the adc champs from my account.

Now there is a chance they may do adc victorious skin....... Way to troll me riot.
I'm so bad that I am too low of a rank to get the victorious skin, regardless of who it is released for.

Lucian/Graves fell off.

I guess it could be kog now that I think of it,but that's a bit of cheating.

Sivir was very strong competitively throughout the entire season,seems like a rather safe bet it's her.
Was it confirmed somewhere that's it's gonna be an AD carry?

> [{quoted}](name=Auryiel,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=6EBw5TE2,comment-id=00000000000100000001000100000000,timestamp=2015-09-15T21:39:46.190+0000)

read the last line.
Victorious {{champion:6}}  confirmed

If it's Sivir I'm gonna be pissed. One because I want it and I don't play ranked (but maybe would have) and two because Sivir already has two of the most unobtainable skins in the game. The Huntress Sivir, which you have to spend like $30 actual dollars to get (and it comes with a bunch of crap you might not want like tons of champions you'll never play.) And Pax Sivir.

I think only Kayle has more unobtainable skins than Sivir if this happens.

(And before anyone says anything I'm not counting skins "in the vault" those can still be obtained with Mystery Gifts and go on sale from time to time.)

> Sivir already has two of the most unobtainable skins in the game. The Huntress Sivir, which you have to spend like $30 actual dollars to get (and it comes with a bunch of crap you might not want like tons of champions you'll never play.) 

I actually have huntress Sivir. I already owned most of the champions, so it was not that expensive (If you own every champ in the bundle it only cost 975 RP).

u and me both brotha.
don't worry though laughing fish, its called garbage can, not garbage cant.
{{champion:82}}
Huehuehuehue

As a main adc, I'm pretty happy with it personally :3
But I do understand your point of vue. Besides the "ADC are only rightclicking" meme, I find this role one of the most difficult to play in the game. Everyone wants you dead, your team doesn't even care about it (I plat V and I still find myself happy when my support, or, miracle happens, even my top, are actually trying to peel for me), a single positioning mistake and you're dead. And ADC is not about rightclicking. It's about knowing who and when to righclick without being in danger. It's about kitting. It's about staying alive, while dealing damage. Oh. And ADC do have spells, you know :D ?
ADC is quite hard. I have found that as of late it has changed from "Always blame the jungler" to "Always blame the ADC".

> [{quoted}](name=MelbaDream,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=6EBw5TE2,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-09-15T18:29:04.262+0000)
>
 I find this role one of the most difficult to play in the game. 

I don't think that's the reason(not saying if the statement is true are not),some of the most popular champions in this game are those who are considered hard,I think it's more with their gameplay,you are very reliant on your team and just don't have too much to offset that(unless you are vayne,hence her popularity).

That's exactly why I said this role :)
Apart from Draven, who is mechanically really difficult to master, and Kalista, which passive takes some time to get used to, all ADC got pretty basic kits, some 'normal' spells, and aren't really hard to master or play well. But the position is. The entire role is.

I've always been an ADC main, and from time to time, I found myself wondering why was this role even played. When you get that bruiser in your face, who just walks to you, just press some buttons and leave you dead, with no reaction of your team, it seems unfair. When you get that assassin on you, who just one shot you and nobody even care, you wander how you're supposed to deal damage and carry the game. 

ADC is team reliant. ADC is positioning reliant. 

And that's why Vayne is too strong currently. She doesn't even need her team help. That means something is wrong, because no ADC should be able to play freely without help. Even if she's intended to be a good duelist, the BOTRK buff made her too strong :/ The mobility  and the damage she already got in her kit, coupled with this item, make her way too strong. She needs only one item to be a threat. Most ADC need at least IE + PD, even LW to be efficient...
Karen ... oh Karen... i wants...
Maybe if Karen Gillan was an ADC, more people would enjoy the role.
Inb4 its only rightclicking
It is when I play. Abilities, like wards, are for supports.
How about when you're first pick and then someone who is last pick autolocks your position and doesn't respond

That too is annoying. Its like people don't realize that you cannot change your pick after you locked in, It doesn't matter how much you wanted to be mid, I was first pick and already locked in Ahri. This is why I prefer teambuilder lol.
I play draft so the guy had to have seen me lol
Oh he saw you. He just didn't care. Draft is annoying as hell lol

I would also give the worst ADC a run for their money as lower then them on adc proficiency.  The worst, in ranked, is when you indicate that you are really bad but except you were last pick, choose your best adc, get stomped, accused of feeding bot, and get accused of being a "noob," when you have informed everyone at how horrific you are in that one position.  The worst is when you are "playing safe" by just last hitting from under your tower, and you get tower dove from their jungler, tanky support, and adc gets last hit, and then you still get accused of being bad...worst is, you have yet to receive one gank from your jungler who has gone Enchantment Devourer on his jungle item and telling you to suck it up until he's sated...by this time, their, probably, Vayne is so fed (having completed her second item), it's pretty much a given where the game is going to go.  Still you press on, but then one of the other lanes is so mad that you fed Vayne because they died to her, that they rage quit and spend the rest of the time at the fountain typing insults at you and /all chatting everyone about how bad you are.

And all because of this forced decision...ahhh, solo queue.
+1 for Karen Gillan.
